reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MUSC 100, MUSC 110.
This course is for BMUS and BA - Music Majors and Minors. For prospective BA Music Majors and Minors ONLY: to register, e-mail Dr. John Roeder at j.roeder@ubc.ca giving your background in music theory. Select MUSC 101 lecture + one tutorial.
description: Harmonic and linear functions of diatonic chords; common progressions and sequences; introduction to tonal hierarchy and prolongation; simple modulation. Compositional and analytical exercises.
